channel.description: Recent content in Youtube on shiv.me

item.title: Impersonations
item.description: Some actors have the incredible talent of keen observation, and Mr Spacey is a master at it. Watch him channeling Pacino around 5:25. In few words, he makes you believe you’re seeing the real Pacino. The ‘Christopher Walken’ is also spot on.
